title: Average regular season home attendance of the Arizona Cardinals 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has rose over the Year.
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Average attendance, about 64185.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Average attendance, of value 60890.0 was reported at Year 2012
